name: Floppy Socks
description:
Term 1 Game Design Major Project 2021!

This project was made in my first term for my game design major in 2021.

It is a flappy bird clone where you need to fly through pipes and beat your highscore. In this game however, you play as a dragon named Floppy Socks!

I knew absolutely nothing about unity and coding at this point and it was created in crunch time. I did animation and art myself.
